metadata.title: CVE-2018-10992 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: lilypond-invoke-editor in LilyPond 2.19.80 does not validate strings beforelaunching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, whichallows remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a craftedURL, as demonstrated by a --proxy-pac-file argument, because the GNU Guilecode uses the system Scheme procedure instead of the system* Schemeprocedure. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2017-17523.

criterions.comment: lilypond: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
